attributes.action: Tougher sentence for 12 yr old boy who raped 6 year old innocent girl
attributes.additional_details: In Norfolk a 12 year old boy raped an innocent 6 yr old wee girl, and showed no remorse on what he has done! Was given 12 month referral order, and a 12 month restraining order not to contact victim or family and her Family! We think he should have been given some sort of custodial sentence and on sex offenders list. No innocent child should be put through this and the rapist running free!

rejection.details:
Sentences that appear to be unduly lenient cannot be referred through the E-Petitions website. If you believe a sentence given in a Crown Court appears to be very low, or unduly lenient, anyone can contact the Attorney General's office asking for the sentence to be reviewed as long as it is within 28 days of sentencing.

Only certain serious offences that were heard in a Crown Court can be considered. Full details of the scheme can be found on our website, the address is www.gov.uk/ago
